name: Unicycle Game
description:
Ride a unicycle around and collect all of the items

Created in 3 hours for Trijam 183 (Theme: Unconventional mode of transport). Created with Unreal Engine 5 and Blender. Background music is Level 4 by Monplaisir, Sound effects generated using ZzFX. The Snowman is from a previous game I made, everything else I made during the 3 hours.

Controls:

W/S - Forwards/Backwards

A/D - Turn

Goal - Collect all of the items and make it to the finish. Once you start moving you won't be able to stop
